chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_747
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
Referring women with risk factors (e.g, placenta praevia) to the appropriate higher level of care for delivery
• Iron supplementation in pregnancy and antenatal screening and treatment of anaemia
• Partogram/labour graph-based management of the first stage of labour to prevent prolonged labour
• Routinely practising active management of the third stage of labour
• Identifying women at risk for atonic uterus and giving additional oxytocin (20 units in one litre Sodium Chloride
0,9% at 120- 240 mL
